Class NVAPIDisplayHelper

Namespace
NVAPIWrapper
Assembly
NVAPIWrapper.dll

Facade helper for an NVIDIA display handle.

public sealed class NVAPIDisplayHelper : IDisposable

public bool SetRefreshRateOverride(uint outputsMask, float refreshRate, bool setDeferred)

Parameters

outputsMask uint

Output mask to apply the override.

refreshRate float

Refresh rate override (0.0 cancels).

setDeferred bool

True to defer to the next modeset.

Returns

bool

True if applied, false if unavailable.
